about_the_game:
Now lead the knights and put down the rebels!

The game is a free add-on for the base game.

This game is made using the GAMEGURU, FPS engine.
An ambitious work that challenges the limits of GAMEGURU.

About game(story)
An uprising broke out in a town in the country of the main character.
You need to lead the knights to put down the revolt.

How to play
It launches the free DLC game launcher after pressing Play in the STEAM app.
Alternatively, run the Level.exe file.
If you do not need this DLC, uncheck DLC in the STEAM app.

Controls
W, A, S, D: Move.
Spacebar: jump.
Dash: Shift key.
ESC: Pause screen.
Left click: Attack

Apology to fans in advance
GAMEGURU FPS engine does not support STEAM achievements and translation (localization).
We apologize for not implementing it as usual.

content_descriptors.notes:
An expression of killing a person with a sword.
Just a little Goa expression.

name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd - Call of GURU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
